content.text:
# Draft:American author mark deleap king

Mark DeLeap King (born April 2) is an American author and technology executive. His professional work has included artificial intelligence (AI), information technology (IT), cloud computing, and data. He is the author of the 2025 book, Perceptions & Realities.
King was born in Dallas, Texas. He holds a Master's degree in Computers.
King has a 30-year career in the technology industry, with a focus on software engineering, cloud architecture, and IT strategy. He has authored articles on technical subjects.
